mapper.select: SELECT * FROM entry_sel_msg WHERE RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND MSG_DIV = #{msgDiv}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO entry_sel_msg(RCRT_NO, MSG_DIV, SUBJECT, MSG_CONT) VALUE(#{rcrtNo}, #{msgDiv}, #{subject}, #{msgCont})
mapper.update: UPDATE entry_sel_msg SET MSG_DIV = #{msgDiv}, SUBJECT = #{subject}, MSG_CONT = #{msgCont} WHERE RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND MSG_SEQ = #{msgSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM entry_sel_msg WHERE RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND MSG_DIV = #{msgDiv}
